backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage mixins, access control, maps for ponds, posts, ribbits, users, tags, likes, and activity tracking, along with related data types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two LilyPage-related UI feature requirements, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing layout, pages, and component behavior.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, root div, favicon, and loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and root layout for the frontend application.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Button component that toggles bookmark state for a lily using useBookmarks and displays a bookmark icon.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the CommentItem component.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty placeholder file for the EmojiReactions component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution text including a caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header with search, create menu, mobile/desktop layouts, user avatar, and search dropdown handling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout rendering header, footer, mobile sidebar drawer, and page outlet with auto-closing mobile drawer on route change.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Navigation sidebar with route-aware links and recent activity list, supporting mobile drawer mode.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a lily post with avatar, metadata, image handling, like/share actions, and optional tag/author visibility.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile drawer wrapper for LeftSidebar with scroll lock and overlay behavior.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows pond details, moderators, stats, and join/leave actions with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile header for a pond with banner, profile image, description, and tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Renders a user ribbit with avatar, timestamp, content, and link to the related lily.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Renders a threaded ribbit with avatar, timestamp, likes, and reply functionality.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Displays trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts using query hooks and memoized sorting.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Mobile full‑screen search modal that displays trending searches and query‑based suggestions.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Search dropdown showing trending searches or suggestions based on input state.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Shows top, trending, and newest tags with activity stats using modular tag list components.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrapper components for tab lists and tab triggers with underline styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages localStorage‑backed bookmarked lily IDs with helpers to add, remove, toggle, and clear.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Debounces a value by a configurable delay and returns the delayed result.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and exposing login and logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Returns whether a given CSS media query currently matches, updating on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching, searching, and mutating pond, user, and membership data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme definitions and custom utility classes for colors, layouts, and UI behaviors.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Utility to format large numbers into short notation like k, M, or B.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image validator and compressor that resizes images, handles GIF detection, and outputs compressed blobs.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Helpers to validate, normalize, and produce error messages for alphanumeric pond names.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Utility to share lily links via the Web Share API or clipboard fallback.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Functions to validate and normalize alphanumeric tags and return error messages.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: LocalStorage-based user identity and Froggy Phrase management, including backups and restoration.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: LocalStorage-based cooldown tracker to prevent repeated lily view increments within 5 minutes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page describing the platform, its features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of all ponds with join status, loading states, and a link to create a new pond.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Form page for creating a lily with support for text, images, links, tagging, validation, and image compression.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Form page for creating a new pond including name validation, descriptions, and compressed banner/profile image uploads.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for post creation.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Shows a user's frog profile with avatar, stats, posts, and comments, including loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage feed listing lilies with sorting, search support, and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a single lily post with replies, view and like handling, sorting, and image lightbox support.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows pond details including description, moderators, visibility, and membership actions.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Renders a pond feed with lilies, join-state handling, and mobile/desktop layouts.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: File is empty and contains no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Lists locally bookmarked lilies with support for loading, removal, and missing-post handling.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Provides top, trending, and newest tag rankings with navigation to individual tag pages.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a specific tag with canonicalization and sorting options.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: React page handling user settings including username changes, avatar upload, froggy phrase management, profile saving, pond membership, and admin/tag tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Metadata file tracking project state, known issues, and feature requests related to fixing back button placement on the Lily page.
